projectDesc.p: This translation was made of the transcription of the undertext of Luke created by the Codex Zacynthius Project in 2018 from multispectral digital images.

editorialDecl.p: This file covers all surviving pages of the undertext. The file includes foliation, lineation and punctuation. Corrections are rendered when this is possible in English. Full details of the creation of the translation are provided in the 2020 book listed above.
The XML specifications used are version 1.5 of the IGNTP Guidelines available at
